Package com.gsm.service.impl

Class ProductServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.service.impl.ProductServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProductService
    @Service
public class ProductServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProductService
    The concrete implementation of the ProductService interface. This class contains the core business logic for managing products. It coordinates interactions between the controllers and the repositories layer.

      • ProductServiceImpl

        @Autowired
public ProductServiceImpl​(ProductRepository productRepository,
                          ProductVariantRepository productVariantRepository,
                          ProductCategoryRepository productCategoryRepository,
                          UnitRepository unitRepository,
                          SaleOrderDetailRepository saleOrderDetailRepository)
        Constructs the service with all required repository dependencies.
        Parameters:
        productRepository - Repository for Product data.
        productVariantRepository - Repository for ProductVariant data.
        productCategoryRepository - Repository for ProductCategory data.
        unitRepository - Repository for Unit data.

    • Method Detail

      • findById

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public ProductDto findById​(java.lang.Long id)
        Finds a single product by its unique identifier.

        Use Case: This method is called when a user navigates to the product detail page to view or edit an existing product's information. It fetches all necessary data to populate the form.

        Specified by:
        findById in interface ProductService
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the product to find.
        Returns:
        The ProductDto corresponding to the given ID.

      • findAll

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.List<ProductDto> findAll()
        Retrieves a list of all products.

        Use Case: This is used to populate the main product list view when the user first navigates to the product management page without any search criteria.

        Specified by:
        findAll in interface ProductService
        Returns:
        A list of ProductDto objects.

      • save

        @Transactional
public ProductDto save​(ProductDto dto)
        Saves a new product or updates an existing one. This method contains the core logic for creating/updating products and their variants.

        Use Case: This is the core logic executed when a user clicks the "Save" button on the product form. It handles both the creation of new products and the updating of existing ones.

        Specified by:
        save in interface ProductService
        Parameters:
        dto - The DTO containing the product data to be saved.
        Returns:
        The saved ProductDto, including any database-generated values like IDs.

      • mapDtoToEntity

        private void mapDtoToEntity​(ProductDto dto,
                            Product product)
        A private helper method to map fields from a ProductDto to a Product entity. This encapsulates the mapping logic and ensures related entities like Category and Unit are fetched.
        Parameters:
        dto - The source DTO.
        product - The target entity to be updated.

      • convertEntityToDto

        private ProductDto convertEntityToDto​(Product product)
        Converts a Product entity to a fully detailed DTO, including its variants.
        Parameters:
        product - The source entity.
        Returns:
        The fully populated ProductDto.

      • convertEntityToDtoSimple

        private ProductDto convertEntityToDtoSimple​(Product product)
        Converts a Product entity to a simplified DTO, intended for list views. This version does not include the list of variants for better performance.
        Parameters:
        product - The source entity.
        Returns:
        A simplified ProductDto.

      • convertVariantEntityToDto

        private ProductVariantDto convertVariantEntityToDto​(ProductVariant variant)
        Converts a ProductVariant entity to its corresponding DTO.
        Parameters:
        variant - The source entity.
        Returns:
        The ProductVariantDto.

      • search

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.List<ProductDto> search​(java.lang.String keyword,
                                         java.lang.String categoryName)
        Searches for products based on a keyword and a category name.

        Use Case: This method is triggered from the product list page when the user types a keyword into the search box or selects a category to filter the list.

        Specified by:
        search in interface ProductService
        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword to search for in the product code and name. Can be null.
        categoryName - The category to filter by. Can be null.
        Returns:
        A list of ProductDtos that match the criteria.

      • deleteByIds

        @Transactional
public void deleteByIds​(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids)
        Deletes one or more products based on a list of IDs. Deletes product variants first to respect foreign key constraints, then deletes the product itself.
        Specified by:
        deleteByIds in interface ProductService
        Parameters:
        ids - A list of product IDs to be deleted.
